channel.title: Podcast on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on PR

item.title: IdeaVault - RPi dashboard
item.description:
I couldn’t help myself after listening to John & Marco discussion about the pricing of Panic’s new app Status Board.

I agree with the pricing of the app, who could deny John’s reasoning? With all due respect,Â  a dedicated iPad just to display a dashboard? sounds like diamond studded car. It is a overkill and I would argue you ruining the destiny of your iPad. It deserves more care than hiding behind your old TV/Monitor.

item.title: Bitsplitting - Logo
item.description: Bitsplitting - Beautiful logo I have seen in a long time. I don’t know how @danielpunkass decided to use one version of the two. I couldn’t decide which is the one I like the most.
